title: Oaktree Raises Record $2.4 Billion at First Close for Special Situations Fund
description: Oaktree Capital Management LP has secured $2.4 billion in commitments for its latest fund focused on corporate special situations, according to people familiar with the matter, setting a firm record for that strategy.
content: Oaktree Capital Management LP has secured $2.4 billion in commitments for its latest fund focused on corporate special situations, according to people familiar with the matter, setting a firm record for that strategy.
